DOC.brief_summary: KNOW-CKD ( KoreaN cohort study Outcome patient With Chronic Kidney Disease ) nation-wide , ten-year longitudinal cohort study , launched 2011 . The aim study ass characteristic risk factor progression complication CKD Korea . Pediatric sub-cohort KNOW-CKD plan enroll 450 child CKD , stage I V ( pre-dialysis ) .
DOC.brief_title: KoreaN Cohort Study Outcome Pediatric Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Seven major pediatric nephrology center Korea enrol child young 20 year CKD . Medical history taking , questionaire assessment socio-economic status , anthropometric measurement , clinical assessment use laboratory imaging test do . Outcome development LV hypertrophy hypertension , growth , neuropsychological status , behavioral status , kidney growth , quality life .
DOC.criteria: Age : < 20 yr CKD stage 1 5 KDIGO guideline predialysis Dialysis
